EmailTemplate.description: This Email template is used by the Training Auto Response Rules for Cases
EmailTemplate.name: Training Auto Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting Cision Client Training Team!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Cision Training. We have received your email message and a member of the Client Training team will be in touch.
If your need is urgent please contact Cision Customer Support at:
U.S. Customer Support: 800.588.3827 Canadian Customer Support: 877.269.3367
Thank you.
Cision Client Training Team
training.us@cision.com | training.ca@cision.com
Cision. Power Your Story.
